attributes.action: Introduce National Rationing to reduce the stockpiling of food
attributes.additional_details:
Currently, there is an unfair balance where OAP's, people in full-time employment, public service workers and people on low wages are not getting access to food.
I want the Government to introduce a firm but fair programme of food rationing within the next few weeks
attributes.background: Introduce a national programme of food rationing so all members of the public have access to essential food supplies
